title: Christmas Watch Face
description: Forget about your old and boring watch face and replace it with the ultimate Christmas Watch Face.Features:★ Eight beautiful Christmas themed watch faces ★ Ambient Mode★ 12/24hr Date format★ Date informationChristmas Watch Face works on both rectangular smart watches such as the Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3 & ASUS Zen watch and round smart watches such as the Moto 360 & LG G R.Upcoming features:★ Localized Date format★ More customization optionsAfter installing the application, the watch will appear in the watch face selection menu of your Android Wear. If it doesn't, go to the android wear app on your phone -> Settings and "Re sync apps" and wait for some time.Watch Face backgrounds taken from www.freepik.com
descriptionHTML:
Forget about your old and boring watch face and replace it with the ultimate Christmas Watch Face.

Features:
★ Eight beautiful Christmas themed watch faces
★ Ambient Mode
★ 12/24hr Date format
★ Date information

Christmas Watch Face works on both rectangular smart watches such as the Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3 & ASUS Zen watch and round smart watches such as the Moto 360 & LG G R.

Upcoming features:
★ Localized Date format
★ More customization options

After installing the application, the watch will appear in the watch face selection menu of your Android Wear. If it doesn't, go to the android wear app on your phone -> Settings and "Re sync apps" and wait for some time.

Watch Face backgrounds taken from www.freepik.com
comments: Love! I really love this watch face. The backgrounds are nice. Updated to 5 stars for fixing the battery drain. Cannot stop looking at this beautiful watchface!
Pretty but Kills battery. Edit..maybe you fixed the watchface battery, but none of faces I liked are there.   Not what I paid for.
Battery drain Faces looks great, however battery drain is too much...even after "fix".
Nice watch faces but sucks watch battery like there is no tomorrow. Less than 8h on my old LG when others last almost 2 days.
Very cute watch faces I think Santa stuck in the chimney is my favorite. :)
Much better Much better after snow animation was turned off. Now add an option to edit text font and this is perfect.
